0.text: It was a charming and terrible sight
0.label: negative

1.text: Gavroche, though shot at, was teasing the fusillade.
1.label: negative

2.text: He had the air of being greatly diverted
2.label: positive

3.text: It was the sparrow pecking at the sportsmen
3.label: negative

8.text: The National Guardsmen and the soldiers laughed as they took aim at him.
8.label: positive

11.text: hid in the corner of a doorway
11.label: neutral

17.text: replied to the grape-shot with his thumb at his nose
17.label: neutral

18.text: and all the while went on pillaging the cartouches
18.label: negative

28.text: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray
28.label: negative

30.text: he was more nimble than they
30.label: negative

31.text: He played a fearful game of hide and seek with death
31.label: negative

32.text: every time that the flat-nosed face of the spectre approached
32.label: neutral

33.text: the urchin administered to it a fillip
33.label: neutral

35.text: better aimed or more treacherous than the rest
35.label: negative

36.text: finally struck the will-o’-the-wisp of a child
36.label: positive

38.text: then he sank to the earth
38.label: negative

39.text: The whole barricade gave vent to a cry
39.label: negative

40.text: but there was something of Antæus in that pygmy;
40.label: neutral

41.text: for the gamin to touch the pavement
41.label: neutral

42.text: is the same as for the giant to touch the earth;
42.label: neutral

43.text: Gavroche had fallen only to rise again;
43.label: negative

44.text: he remained in a sitting posture
44.label: negative

45.text: a long thread of blood streaked his face
45.label: negative

46.text: he raised both arms in the air
46.label: neutral

47.text: glanced in the direction whence the shot had come
47.label: neutral

51.text: With my nose in the gutter
51.label: negative

54.text: A second bullet from the same marksman stopped him short
54.label: negative

55.text: This time he fell face downward on the pavement
55.label: neutral

57.text: This grand little soul had taken its flight
57.label: positive
